section.title: Incubation Exit Criteria
section.p: A major Apache sub project goal for XMLBeans is exiting from incubation. Here is a link to the exit criteria post on general@incubator.apache.org (XMLBeans Exit Criteria).
section.note: Need to change this link over to a Wiki page so we can show/update the status on each item.

section.title: XMLBeans Version 1 Project Management
section.p: XMLBeans Version 1 is the current stable incubated release

section.title: XMLBeans Version 2 Project Management
section.p: You can find information about XMLBeans 2.0 planning at XMLBeans Feature Plan if you want to provide ideas or feedback on this planning it is best to post it to either xmlbeans-dev@xml.apache.org or xmlbeans-user@xml.apache.org.
